Legit ramen in Barcelona?!I know, I know.  As an Asian female Yelper, I was skeptical.  Add that to the fact that my hometown of Los Angeles and my current residence of San Francisco are hubs for amazing ramen, and skeptical doesn't even begin to describe my reaction when my boyfriend suggested we go here for dinner one night.  Once I was there, though, eating flavorful ramen with melt-in-your-mouth pork slices in a spicy broth turned this skeptic into a believer.  Yes, there is legit ramen in Barcelona. We even told the Irish owner that it was just as good as the ramen back home in SF.  And that's the honest truth, Yelpers.
